title: Rav Chaim's Emotional Letter
body: Rabbi Chaim Feinstein, Rosh Yeshiva of Ateres Shlomo, wrote a heartfelt letter to his student Ariel Shamai, who's imprisoned for draft evasion, expressing his love and support.

title: Shas Rabbonim Blast Aryeh Deri
body: Senior Shas rabbis, including Rav Yitzchok, slam party leader Aryeh Deri for re-entering the government, calling it a fraught period for Torah study.

title: Yisrael Eichler's Emotional Plea
body: Rabbi Yisrael Eichler urges traditional Jews to join atzeres in Yerushalayim against proposed draft law, party members discuss preparations for massive event.

title: Israeli Educator Attacked in NYC
body: Rabbi Rami Glickstein, 58, was violently assaulted in an antisemitic hate crime near Mr. Broadway in Midtown Manhattan. The attack began when a man confronted him, authorities are investigating.
